fields.name: Haruharu WONDER Black Rice Hyaluronic Anti-wrinkle Serum - 50ml
fields.description:
HaruHaru Wonder Black Rice Serum contains an antioxidant-rich fermented black rice, plus ultra-hydrating hyaluronic acid. They work together to make this milky serum the perfect step in your anti-ageing routine, leaving you with bouncy and firmer-looking skin.

Black rice is rich in antioxidants and is full of highly concentrated polyphenol and flavonoid pigments which protects skin against free radicals, including ultraviolet radiation and pollution, and encourage new cell growth.

Hyaluronic acid provides comforting hydration deep into the skin, while added beta-glucan and red ginseng extract heal and rejuvenate. Lavender oil was added to soothe irritations.
The brand's distinctive technology delivers fermented black rice extract to the skin deeply and effectively with sphere-shaped liposomes infused in Panax Ginseng Root ingredients.

WONDER's Panax Ginseng liposome contains a Saponin substance infused with 6-year Ginseng concentrate to eliminate impurities and helps with anti-ageing.
95% naturally-derived ingredients, vegan-friendly, cruelty-free.

The serum is suitable for all skin types. This milky serum is perfect for those who need a boost of intense hydration and improve skin elasticity. Add a couple of drops of Haruharu WONDER Black Rice Facial Oil to create an even creamier emulsion.

Size: 50ml
fields.how_to_use:
To be used after cleansing and toner. Shake thoroughly before use. Apply a small amount onto skin, and lightly pat to absorb fully. Best to follow with essence or cream and finish with facial oil.

Caution In Use: 

1. In case of having side effects such as red rash, swollen and/or itching while using this product, or in case such symptoms appear by direct sunlight or after using it, consult a dermatologist immediately.

2. Do not apply it on the part where you have a scar, eczema or dermatitis.

3. Precautions for treatment and storage. Keep it out of reach of children and store away from direct sunlight. 

We recommend doing a patch test on a wrist or behind the ear before using any new product.
fields.ingredients:
Water, Glycerin, Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Camellia Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Phyllostachys Pubescens Shoot Bark Extract, Aspergillus Ferment, Hyaluronic Acid, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Cyclodextrin, Sclerotium Gum, C12-16 Alcohols, Palmitic Acid, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Usnea Barbata (Lichen) Extract, Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Pulsatilla Koreana Extract, Beta-glucan, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterois, Behenyl Alcohol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Phytate, Tocopherol, Adenosine, Phenethyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil

fields.name: COSRX Acne Pimple Master Patch
fields.description:
COSRX Acne Pimple Master Patch protects a wounded or troubled area from getting worse and maintains the humidity of skin to prevent further breakouts.

The product contains one sheet of patches with 24 patches. These little thin clear hydrocolloid pimple patches feel similar to a hydrogel sheet mask in texture but are a spot treatment.

Any patch will make whiteheads, blackheads and picked zits to disappear overnight without creating a dry patch.

With three differently sized patches in a pack, you can choose which one will cover your bases.
fields.how_to_use: Wash and dry the targeted area you want to treat. Don't apply any skin treatments or moisturizers between the patch and your skin. Choose a right size patch and apply it directly to skin imperfection. Remove in the morning.

fields.name: Beauty of Hoseon Calming Serum Green tea with Panthenol - 30ml
fields.description:
Beauty of Joseon Calming Serum is enriched with naturally-derived calming & moisturizing ingredients. It contains 50% green tea leaf water, 30% Mugwort and 5% Panthenol. It is now in renewed version and vegan-friendly

The lightweight serum enriched with traditional Korean herbal medicine ingredients (‘hanbang’) targets redness and sensitivity. Green tea, rich in antioxidants, helps reduce sebum and oil production. In addition, it soothes and evens skin tone. The main component of green tea, EGCG (catechin), is composed of tannins and polyphenols. It is known to effectively improve skin damaged by UV rays. UV rays are the main cause of skin darkening and stimulate aging.

Catechin suppresses the synthesis of the melanin pigment caused by UV rays and removes free radicals that promote ageing, thereby helping to keep skin clearer. Green tea contains a large amount of vitamin C, 5-8 times more than lemon, which is a core component needed to make skin bright.

On top of that, panthenol helps keep skin smooth and supple, while Centella Asiatica calms.

Other ingredients and their properties:

- calming & soothing: Artemisia vulgaris extract, Centella Asiatica extract

- moisturizing & hydrating: Glycerin, Sodium hyaluronate, Propolis extract Best for oily, normal and combination skin types.

With a pH of 6.6, this serum is formulated without artificial fragrances, parabens, sulfates, artificial color, alcohol, silicone, mineral oil and essential oils.

Size: 30ml

fields.name: Krave - Makeup Re-Wined - 100ml
fields.description:
A one-of-a-kind jelly oil cleanser that makes cleansing fun and effortless. Makeup Re-Wined gently takes off makeup, sunscreen, and impurities using sustainably sourced, upcycled grapeseed oil. Unwind your day and Re-Wined back to your true skin self.

A Transformational First Step

Congrats! You've made it through the day. You even wore real clothes, put on mascara, and interacted with the general public. You *earned* a full night's sleep. 

Well almost. Listen carefully: don't get in bed. We know your duvet has never looked fluffier. But walk away. Open the bathroom. Turn on the faucet. And wash your face. We've made it easier than ever to melt away stubborn makeup (yes, even the third attempt at wing eyeliner). Rewind to a time with soft, clean skin. Future you will be so happy - and hopefully sound asleep.
fields.how_to_use:
Clean off heavy makeup and waterproof sunscreen with makeup rewind. After rinsing with water, gently massage with Matcha Hemp Hydrating Cleanser until foam is formed, and then rinse with lukewarm water.

Pair with Matcha Hemp Hydrating Cleanser
When you’re craving: A double cleanse
Why it works: Removes any leftover residue, while leaving your skin supple and hydrated.
How to use: Use Makeup Re-Wined to remove stubborn makeup and/or waterproof sunscreen. Rinse. Finish off with Matcha Hemp Hydrating cleanser and gently massage it until lather forms. Rinse with lukewarm water.
Extra tip: Use Makeup Re-Wined to clean your makeup brushes, sponges, and more!
fields.ingredients:
PETA-certified vegan and cruelty free.

Upcycled Grapeseed Oil: Lightweight, non-comedogenic oil that helps break down oil-based impurities like makeup + SPF.
Sunflower Seed Oil: Gentle cleansing oil that's rich in barrier-supporting Linoleic Acid to help prevent irritation.
Vitamin E: Provides antioxidant benefits and helps condition the skin during cleansing.
Full Ingredient List


The color and texture of Makeup Re-Wined may naturally vary slightly from batch to batch. No worries! This is a normal occurrence when using naturally-derived ingredients and it does not impact the efficacy of the formula.

fields.name: Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask (Berry)
fields.description:
Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask is your solution for plump, soft, smooth lips.

It gently melts dead skin cells and makes the lips feel smooth and elastic during sleep. Available in berry color.

This Lip Sleeping Mask has a softening balm texture that closely adheres to lips for quick absorption. Enriched with vitamin C and antioxidants, its Berry Mix Complex™ offers a nutritiously sweet and fragrant blend of raspberry, strawberry, cranberry, blueberry, and goji berry.

It is perfect for dry, rough lips, making them smooth and supple.

Moisture Wrap™ Laneige’s patented moisture technology puts active ingredients such as hydro-ion mineral water, evening primrose root extract, and Hunza Apricot extract in the dense beta-glucan moisture film (network). It helps the skin absorb the ingredients densely into the skin during 8 hours of sleep.

Size: 20g
fields.how_to_use:
Step 1 - Before going to bed at night, apply an adequate amount on the lips using the built-in spatula.
Step 2 - The next morning, gently wipe the lips clean with tissue or cotton pad.

We recommend doing a patch test on a wrist or behind the ear before using any new product.

Clinically proven to reduce hair fall in just 7 days*! * Clinical test conducted on 21 women, P&K Skin Research Center (21 Nov-20 Dec 2019)
This two-Month usage ampoule is formulated with 84% high concentration of herbal ingredients such as whole korean ginseng lingzhi wilfordi root and ginger to reduce hair fall & strengthen weakened scalp & hair.
fields.how_to_use:
Use once a day. One ampoule = 1 week dosage.

- On clean & towel-dried hair, apply essence with the massage tip touching the scalp. - Apply along the scalp focusing on areas that require more attention. - Gently massage for around 3 minutes or until essence is fully absorbed into scalp. - No need to rinse off.

8 x 20 ml (2 months dosage)
1 ampoule = 1 week usage

Wash off immediately when product gets into your eyes.
In case of getting red spots, swelling, inflammation or itching side effects while or after using the product, stop using the product and contact a doctor right away.
Do not use on damaged or broken skin.
Handling and storage precautions: i) Keep out of reach from children. ii) Keep away from direct sunlight.

fields.name: TonyMoly Shiny Foot Super Peeling Liquid - Peeling Foot Mask
fields.description: Embarrassed of your feet? Don't be! Our shiny foot super peeling liquid helps painlessly remove and improve dry patches and rough calluses from the soles of your feet. The unique formula fortified with fruit extract is a gentle way to remove layers of dead skin cells so you can achieve baby soft feet! Ingredients such as AHA and BHA help remove excessive foot calluses, and peppermint extract, argan oil and lavender relieves stress while keeping feet moisturized and smooth.
fields.how_to_use: Place the plastic booties around each foot. Pour and distribute the peeling liquid in each booty equally. Tie the plastic booties with ties located at top of the boot so there are no gaps. Wait approximately 1-1.5 hours. Try to avoid walking while waiting. Remove plastic booties (preferably inside the shower or tub to avoid any potential spillage) and discard. Thoroughly rinse off with cool water. In about 4-6 days, dead skin from your feet (calluses) will begin to peel away. You do not have to forcefully peel the skin, just let it roll off naturally. You will have feet as soft as a baby in just 2 weeks!
